job.title: Senior C++ Engineer
job.description:
Who We Are
Firebolt is a major shake-up to the cloud data warehouse space. So far we’ve built the fastest, most scalable, and most hardware efficient cloud data warehouse in the market, by far, and have helped some of the most data-forward companies in the world with their biggest data challenges. But this is just the beginning. We are a strong team of world-class data experts, led by ex-founders from Sisense and Looker. With $164M of recent funding by top VCs, we are poised to grow quickly and change how we work with data and what can be done with data.
About The Team
Firebolt is a Cloud Native system, consisting of numerous components provisioning, orchestrating and exposing the unprecedented capabilities of our Analytical Database (Data Warehouse).
You will be working on the database itself - the Core Engine, which is written in modern C++, judiciously embracing the features of C++14/17/20 targeting the Linux platform.
The Role
Take a key position in our R&D team
Take part in the definition of our product design and architecture
Design, build and maintain our cutting-edge database core engine
Developing highly distributed, multithreaded, low latency core engine
Requirements
About you
BSc degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
3+ years of proven experience as a professional developer of production software
3+ years of experience working with C++ on a production software
Fluency in modern C++ (C++11 and above) language, compilers, libraries, and patterns
Familiarity with high performance, low latency, highly multithreaded development is an advantage
Experience developing for Linux
Excellent analytical skills
A big bonus if you have
Familiarity with OS internals, memory management, file systems
Familiar with cloud infra development
Familiarity with code profiling tools
Familiarity with distributed computing, networking, lockless algorithms, and datastructures
Familiarity with Golang, python, and shell scripting
Familiarity with one of the following: FoundationDB, Aerospike, or any high-performance KV-store
Background in playing any classical musical instrument
